comment: A really , truly humble thank you to all of the supporters out there ! This election isn't just about our future here in America , but the world-at-large ! The stakes have * NEVER * been higher ! <URL>

comment: I'm trying to keep track of all the GIFs I uploaded to tenor in this thread . Since they are on tenor anyone should be able to share them on Twitter . I also try to upload to giphy so I have all platform covered ! I feel like we need happy GIFs on <URL>
